Investor_0_pre_2.name: Liam OConnor
Investor_0_pre_2.content: I have demonstrated strong negotiation skills and a strategic mindset throughout the investment process. By securing a favorable allocation of profits, I have reinforced my reputation as an ambitious and pragmatic investor, prioritizing personal gain while maintaining an advantageous position. My behavior reflects trustworthiness and competence, with a tendency to benefit by maximizing my returns.
